com.nimsoft.nimbus
Class NimProbe

java.lang.Object
  com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimProbeBase
      com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimProbe

public class NimProbe
extends NimProbeBase

The probe class

This class is the main probe class.

Instantiate the class, do some initialization, create call backs and let the probe run forever.

A runnable small random probe example is shown in snippet below. The random probe is very simple and only register one call back returning a random number. In addition a timer call back, that does nothing, is registered

Snippet 

 package com.mycompany;
 import java.util.Random;
 
 import com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimException;
 import com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimLog;
 import com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimProbe;
 import com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimSession;
 import com.nimsoft.nimbus.PDS;
 
 public class RandomProbe {
    private static NimLog _logger = NimLog.getLogger(RandomProbe.class); // The logger
 
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        try {
            new RandomProbe().doit(args);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
 
   private void doit(String[] args) throws Exception {
       // The name of the probe is RandomProbe, version 1.0
       // The name of the company is MyCompany
       // The probe expects a configuration file RandomProbe.cfg (<probename>.cfg) present in the start-up directory
       // The configuration file at least has to contain one section like:
       // <setup>
       // </setup>
       // The key loglevel can be used in the setup section to set a default log level
       // A logfile with the name RandomProbe.log (<probename>.log) is created
       NimProbe probe = new NimProbe("RandomProbe","1.0","MyCompany",args);
       do {
           // Set the loglevel to log info, warning, error and fatal
           _logger.setLogLevel(NimLog.INFO);
 
           // register a callback with one parameter "debug"
           probe.registerCallback(this,"random","cbRandom",new String[]{"debug"});
 
           // register a callback on timer (only to show how)
           // The timer callback is called each 30 seconds in a separate thread
           probe.registerCallbackOnTimer(this,"cbOnTimer",30*1000,true);
 
           // start the do dorever loop that can end in two possible ways:
           // true if a _restart command is received
           // false if a _stop command is received
       } while (probe.doForever());
   }
 
   public void cbRandom(NimSession session, String debug) throws NimException {
       _logger.log(NimLog.INFO,"cbRandom with parameter debug=" + debug);
       PDS pds = new PDS();
       pds.put("random",new Random().nextFloat());
 
       // the callback must always return a response
       // because it is the response part of a request/response pair
       session.sendReply(NimException.OK,pds);
   }
 
   public void cbOnTimer() throws NimException {
       _logger.log(NimLog.INFO,"cbOnTimer was called, but does nothing");
   }

registerCallback

public void registerCallback(Object object,
                             String cmd,
                             String methodname,
                             String[] parameternames)
                      throws NimException
Register a callback with int, String or byte[] parameters. The parameter names are converted to the type given in the method (String and int parameters are legal). If the callback method contains a PDS parameter, the data PDS is returned in this parameter.

Parameters:
object - The object that has the method to be called
cmd - The command name in the PDS header
methodname - The method name to be called
parameternames - The parameter names read from the data pds
Throws:
NimException

registerCallbackOnTimer

public void registerCallbackOnTimer(Object object,
                                    String methodname,
                                    long sleeptime,
                                    boolean inseparatethread)
                             throws NimException
Register scheduled timer callbacks. Avoid time consuming code if the method is called in the main thread.

Parameters:
object - The object that has the method to be called
methodname - The method name to be called
sleeptime - The time between calls in milliseconds
inseparatethread - True if the on timer thread is to be started in a separate thread (default is in the main loop)
Throws:
NimException

doForever

public boolean doForever()
                  throws NimException
The "initializer and "forever loop". This method only returns when a _stop or _restart command is received from the NimBUS manager or if an fatal exception occurs.

Returns:
true if restart
Throws:
Throws - NimException

cbStop

protected void cbStop(NimSession session)
               throws NimException
Callback for _stop. The command stops the probe. This method is usually (only) called from the NimBUS manager when it sends a _stop command

Parameters:
session - The used NimSession
Throws:
NimException
